title: [Environmental/Nature/Meditation/Relax] - Seascapes [2CD]
description:
Seascapes [2CD set, 2 hours]

--"Let a mood of peace and profound relaxation wash over you"
--Format: MP3, 128kbps

 
DISC 1

1.) The Gentle Surf
Close your eyes?Relax

Listen as the ocean surf tears apart? then gently caresses the golden sand? Listen to the sea gulls, and let the stress of modern living dissolve to the endless roar of the breaking surf.

2.) Ocean Voyage
The presence of beautiful and melodic New Age music pleasantly underscores the rhythm of the timeless sea. The enjoyment of this agreeable mix of nature and musical expression will be a warm and wonderful reminder of the eternity of time. Experience the release of everyday tension to the soothing of the gentle surf.

 
DISC 2

1.) The Timeless Sea
A mood of peace and profound relaxation washes over you as Chopin?s music combines irresistibly with the rhythm of the ?Timeless Sea?, creating a harmonious blend of nature and melody. The fusion of sounds elicit a deep pastoral response. Close your eyes and sail the imaginary waves into your inner most thoughts.

--Nocturne in B minor 
--Nocturne in F major 
--Nocturne in C sharp minor 
--Nocturne in D flat major 
--Waltz in A minor 
--Berceuse in D major
               Piano Solo: Dubravka Tomsic

2.) The Poetic Sea
The words of the great poets merge with nature?s own rhythmic sound: The Poetic Sea. The rolling surf provides a dramatic background to the reading, punctuated with gentle music that will fill you with a wondrous sense of tranquility and profound relaxation.

--The Sea-D.H. Lawrence 
--Cape Cottage at Sunset-W.B. Glazier 
--Dover Beach-Matthew Arnold
               Narrated by Andrew Macmillian
